attributes.action: Call for the resignation and replacement of Theresa May. Effective immediately.
attributes.additional_details: New prime minister and cabinet who believe and are able to steer the country robustly out of this farcical moment in history.
attributes.background: Over the course of the Brexit debacle, the people have voted, however, noone has listened. Our Prime Minister, is making the country an embarrassment, we need a strong robust and believer in Brexit. Therefore we ask for the resignation and replacement immediately of the Prime Minister and cabinet.

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
